metadata.title: CVE-2024-47603 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handlingcomponents. A null pointer dereference vulnerability has been discovered inthe gst_matroska_demux_update_tracks function within matroska-demux.c. Thevulnerability occurs when the gst_caps_is_equal function is called withinvalid caps values. If this happen, then in the functiongst_buffer_get_size the call to GST_BUFFER_MEM_PTR can return a nullpointer. Attempting to dereference the size field of this null pointerresults in a null pointer dereference. This vulnerability is fixed in1.24.10.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
